publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5015 Brian Adam: Aberdeen Evening Express 40,000th Issue—That the Parliament congratulates the Evening Express on reaching 40,000 issues; recognises its role as a focal point for the community; praises its contribution to Aberdeen city, including its earnest campaigning for local issues; applauds the hard work of newspaper’s staff, whose dedication underpins the success of Aberdeen Journals Ltd, and believes that the newspaper has a valuable role to play in Aberdeen for many years to come.

S2M-5015 Aberdeen Evening Express 40,000th Issue (lodged on 25 October 2006) Stewart Stevenson*, Alex Johnstone*, Richard Lochhead*, Bruce Crawford*, Shiona Baird*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Robin Harper*, Colin Fox*

S2M-5015 Brian Adam: Aberdeen Evening Express 40,000th Issue—That the Parliament congratulates the Evening Express on reaching 40,000 issues; recognises its role as a focal point for the community; praises its contribution to Aberdeen city, including its earnest campaigning for local issues; applauds the hard work of newspaper’s staff, whose dedication underpins the success of Aberdeen Journals Ltd, and believes that the newspaper has a valuable role to play in Aberdeen for many years to come. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson, Alex Johnstone, Richard Lochhead, Bruce Crawford, Shiona Baird, Mrs Nanette Milne, Ms Maureen Watt, Robin Harper, Colin Fox
S2M-5015 Aberdeen Evening Express 40,000th Issue (lodged on 25 October 2006) Mr David Davidson*, John Swinburne*, Donald Gorrie*
